name: Hidden Objects - Florida Adventure & Object Time
name_original: Hidden Objects - Florida Adventure & Object Time
description:
Hidden Objects – Florida is a beautifully designed finder game with numerous “Sunshine” state themed levels and fun items. Search and Find plenty of Florida beach landmarks, flamingos, alligators and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, quest challenge for Hidden Object fans!

Take a Florida tour visiting Miami Beach, Daytona, Orlando, Ernest Hemingway’s House in Key West, Vizcaya, Disney, Lego Land, Key Largo, Cypress Gardens, the Southernmost Point of the USA, Swamp Lands, and more finding hidden objects!

Hidden Objects – Florida Adventures features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics with Florida Themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels of Hidden Object Scenes
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Explore the Sunshine State
Upbeat Music
Free Updates


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
4 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
4 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
10 Unique Levels
